title: Feature cache hydrator helper
author: Gus R.
description: Hydrates feature flags into cache before a deploy.

es.title: Helper para hidratar la cache de features
es.description: Hidrata feature flags en la cache antes de un deploy.

lines.content: def hydrate_feature_cache(cache, keys: list[str]) -> dict[str, str | None]:

bugPatterns.description: Iterates cache.get one key at a time instead of using a batched mget.

localizedDescription.es: Itera cache.get clave por clave en vez de usar un mget batched.
